body: Also can we just get rid of some of these?  In particular it's really strange to need to call THTensor_getStoragePtr -- there's no Storage method on THTensor?  (I know that's probably because we are moving storages around, but there's almost certainly an equivalent in C10, right?)
body_html: Also can we just get rid of some of these? In particular it's really strange to need to call THTensor_getStoragePtr -- there's no Storage method on THTensor? (I know that's probably because we are moving storages around, but there's almost certainly an equivalent in C10, right?)
body_text: Also can we just get rid of some of these?  In particular it's really strange to need to call THTensor_getStoragePtr -- there's no Storage method on THTensor?  (I know that's probably because we are moving storages around, but there's almost certainly an equivalent in C10, right?)
